review: I LOVE the Fire TV Stick. It's so easy to connect to a variety of services on a big screen.  Watched some great Smithsonian programs and downloaded cooking classes. I'm enjoying the variety of apps. I have a good stereo and the sound coming out is, as expected, great.My only complaint is the battery compartment on the remote is impossible to open. Fortunately, I was given the voice remote along with my fire stick as a gift, and that battery slot opens just fine.

review: AMAZING! I am finding more and more as I explore what is available with the Fire TV Stick. Great picture, easy to use, seamless presentation on every single thing we've watched so far. I have dropped my cable TV service and now use this for all my movie watching and watch news using a digital antenna; I'm saving over $60 dollars a month and really feel like I have more options than I did with the cable line up. A GREAT product!!
